sentence: The room we had was very nice but a bit dated
The room although the decor was a bit tired was very comfortable and well appointed with a ocean and pool view
We sat overlooking the outdoor patio but it was dark and all I saw outside was a vent so congested with puffs of dust it was gross
Otherwise bottled water is 60 in the room
A long patio facing the ocean for outdoor dining morning noon and night
Final complaint cheap white plastic chairs and tables on the balcony
They accommodated me with 2 king beds instead of one and I did not have to switch rooms the 3rd night because I added a night
otherwise the lunches dinners that we ate at the hotel were bland uninspiring and in my view not good value for money
My wife and sunk into them and my back hurt so much I had to buy and take Aleve for the first time in my life
Room furniture could be freshened updated
The service to the room was professional without being stuffy
I booked the most basic room
While the resort property itself was very nice the room was much less than satisfactory
The weather was quite cool so we especially enjoyed being able to hear the ocean from our room
I wanted to call about it but my wife was so tired of having hotel employees in our 140 a night suite with us she would not let me so we never had a meal on this spectacular deck
Room service is available
The view being able to watch the sunrise from the balcony or sitting in the rocking chairs
All in it was a disappointing pick kept afloat by its location and view
The other major selling point is the deck out front with rocking chairs
When the front desk heard it was our anniversary they complimentary upgraded our room
The rooms are good sized but the bathrooms are old and not up to the quality of a good Days Inn
Nice room with ocean viewHousekeping talks to loud to each other at the entrance of my room early in the morning making to much noise i told them but did n’t work at all
We were not happy with our original room so she made it possible for us to move and it was my husbands birthday so she sent him a wonderful fruit bowl
We particularly enjoyed breakfast and dinner on the porch followed by a few minutes in the rockers
Unfortunately we were seated at a fantastic location a table on a deck right at the edge of the beach
Hopefully it will get a complete re model from the ceiling to the flooring and all new furniture with a new quieter hvac system and new plumbing
Although this is a regular hotel the hallways and room elevators are motel like and outdoors
my room had a huge crack in the window
Our stay began with a late checkin because they did n’t have our room ready
Stop your search and book your room now
We arrived a little before 3 and rooms were not ready so we ate lunch at the restaurant
Also this balcony looks over a patio area which was being used for a breakfast business meeting area
I resent the fact that a microwave is not included in its amenities and that their fridge is so miniature
The number of rooms is extensive and they are beautiful but
We went in a group and everyone else in the group was able to check in and get their room except us
Going out of his way to telling us all about the amenities as he took our luggage to the room
I did need to go through the bedroom to get to the bathroom but it was no problem

When taking a shower there is not a shower door or curtain to close only a half partition which is located near the shower head and totally leaves the back half open that allows plenty of water to reach the floor not to mention allow a cold draft to get in if you are one of the people like me who likes to take a steam showers this is not for you
Otherwise the Pelican is a stunning property Splurge for an oceanfront room views are jaw dropping
This room can be shut off from the entry
